properties.label: URL to call
properties.name: url
properties.caption: Send data to this URL when the button is clicked
properties.help: URL used to perform the HTTP request when this button is clicked.

properties.label: HTTP status code
properties.name: responseStatusCode
properties.help: Holds the HTTP status code of the response

properties.label: Data sent on click
properties.name: dataToSend
properties.help: Can be used to fulfill a contract

properties.label: Successful response value
properties.name: dataFromSuccess
properties.help: Holds the response when the request is successful

properties.label: Target URL on success
properties.name: targetUrlOnSuccess
properties.help: Next page to display, for applications. In the Portal, it is ignored as navigation is managed automatically
